title: Seoul last day - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
Yesterday was officially my last day in Seoul; I use part of the day to practice a Drupal 8 introductory session I will lead next Tuesday at CI&T Tokyo offices, before my Drupal Console session.

After a brunch, I move toward the War Memorial museum.

This museum was interesting, and big 25% is dedicated to the history of Korean folks since 2000 B.C and their battles.

The rest of the museum, focus his attention on the Korean War and their current conflict.

I have to say, was weird as Colombian to see for first time in my life, a mention of Colombia in an International War.







Walking

Distance (steps)
Seoul (today) 8.879
Previously 344.310
Total 353.189
